text: On April 2, 2021, a car crashed in the north barricade outside the United States Capitol in Washington, D.C., along Constitution Avenue, killing a Capitol Police officer and injuring another. The Capitol was placed under a lockdown with only a few members were present in the building during the attack. The perpetrator, 25-year-old African American Noah Ricardo Green, died at a hospital after being shot. ==References== April Capitol attack Category:2020s in Washington, D.C. Category:April 2021 events Category:Crime in Washington, D.C.
title: April 2021 United States Capitol attack
